column2: Your Infection has put you in grave danger on multiple occasions. The pain and foul smell have finally subsided and your wound looks clean.
You realize you have been free from your Cough for a few days now. Being able to sleep at night without waking up coughing is a blessing.
Your Fever has passed and you regain some strength and focus in your daily routine.
After a very troublesome period, your Diarrhea has finally stopped.
Your Vomiting has finally stopped and you can start eating regular meals again.
The Chest Pains you have been experiencing lately seem to have stopped. The Pains have been occurring less frequently, until recently they just disappeared.
You haven't had any severe Cramps for some time now, whatever caused them must have been dealt with.
Whatever was left of your Rash is no longer visible, and the spot where it was is no longer itching or causing pain.
Your pressing Headache has gone away, and you can focus your mind of things again.
Excruciating Abdominal Pains have been disabling you lately, but now that you come to think of it, they are no longer there.
The sense of Fatigue that has been present lately now seems to have disappeared, and you once again have the energy to carry out your duties.
Your Malaise is no more. If it wasn't just imagination then whatever caused it must have disappeared.
You have recovered well from the Flu, now the coughing, fever, and headache are just unpleasant memories.
After some very worrying dehydration and abdominal pains, your Dysentery has finally ended.
Excruciating pain and stiff joints have been tormenting you, but they are now much less severe. Gout is no longer a problem.
Your violent vomiting and diarrhea have gone away, you have recovered from what must have been Food Poisoning.
The violent outbursts coupled with losses of consciousness, which seemed like a nightmare, is now just a memory. You have survived Rabies.
Your tumors are no more, and it seems the disease is no longer spreading. It will be a while until you are completely back to normal but the Cancer is gone.
Your cough has subsided and the ill-boding fever has left your body. You have survived Pneumonia.
The sores on your body have vanished and you are almost back to your regular self. You are rid of the Great Pox.
It's a miracle! Feeling has returned to your extremities. You survived Leprosy.
You awake rejuvenated. After some moments of disbelief you realize that your fever has passed and your appetite has returned. You have survived Consumption.
Your delirium has lifted and your temperature is back to normal. You have beaten Slow Fever.
A vigor has returned to you as the aches from your recent disease leaves your body. You have survived Camp Fever.
You're not sure how it happened, but your skin has returned to a healthy color and the abscesses are gone. It would seem you have survived the Plague.
The feverish state you've been stuck in lately is replaced by a new energy. Meanwhile the rashes are gone. Measles, schmeasles.
The many blisters on your body have faded, almost all of them gone now. So much for Smallpox.
The many blisters on your... body have faded, almost all of them gone now. So much for Syphilis.

Your Court Physician [court_physician.GetBestName] has come to see you and offers treatment for your illness. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] explains that there are several different types of treatment [court_physician.GetSheHe] can offer.

[court_physician.GetBestName] looked me deep in the eyes before he forced me to drink the dirty water he had brought from his office. It was apparently filled with tiny creatures which should drive out the disease demons within me.

The pot which [court_physician.GetBestName] brought with [court_physician.GetHerHim] to your chambers emitted a strange buzzing sound. Before you could stop [court_physician.GetHerHim] [court_physician.GetSheHe] threw it on the floor, where it exploded in a cloud of pottery shards and swarm of furious bees. As your physician fled the room, you remained their only target.

You could not believe your eyes when [court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] pulled a severed hand from [court_physician.GetHerHis] satchel. The black spots on its finger sent chills down your spine and you demanded to know where [court_physician.GetSheHe] got it from. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] only hushed you and proceeded to rub the severed hand against your chest.

[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] presented you with a potion of the most peculiar sorts. It had neither odor nor taste and possessed the appearance of liquid silver. The metallic potion was easy enough to ingest and you could not understand why this was the risky treatment option.

[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] insisted that the only cure for your condition was a naked midnight run. During the next full moon [court_physician.GetSheHe] forced you to undress and sprint through the wilderness. "Do not stop until your legs give out under you!" [court_physician.GetSheHe] yelled after you. "Expel the evil through your sweat!"

The powder was yellow and had a delicious scent. You were distraught to see [court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] mix it with brimstone and sprinkle it over the still tepid gall-bladder of a beaver. The animal had been found rabid, frothing from the mouth, exhibiting clear signs of the illness. "We fight evil with evil, [Root.GetMasterMistress]."

[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] approached you with a small knife. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] held your arm steady and made a precise incision, barely breaking your skin. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] then proceeded to press something against the wound. It looked like diseased tissue and you shuddered.

[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] handed you a plate with a gray powdery substance on it. Apparently it consisted of ground-up scabs from a person in a worse state than you. [court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] showed no indication of joking as [court_physician.GetSheHe] told you to lean in and inhale as much as you could though your nose.

[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] made you drink a draught of poppy before strapping you down on [court_physician.GetHerHis] operating table. You almost dozed off while [court_physician.GetSheHe] prepared [court_physician.GetHerHis] instruments, but when [court_physician.GetSheHe] raised a scalpel towards your eye, you felt wide awake. "I am sorry, my [Root.GetLordLady], but we must remove the root of the problem."

[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] gave you a draught which tasted most peculiar. It made you feel numb and your eyelids started drooping. "I apologize, my [Root.GetLordLady], but you do not want to be awake for this next part" [court_physician.GetSheHe] said. Panic hit you and you tried to get up from the operating table, but your limbs would not obey.

[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName]'s assistant assured [court_physician.GetHerHim] you were asleep. However, [court_physician.GetFirstName]'s potion had failed to fully take effect– even though you could neither speak nor move, you were still aware of everything they did to you. You tried to scream and thrash, but you were a prisoner in your own body. The procedure seemed to last forever...

[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] informed you that [court_physician.GetSheHe] had identified the tainted tissue which was the root of your disease, and that removing it would most likely cure you. You were most pleased and agreed to the surgery. However, in hindsight, you wish that [court_physician.GetFirstName] told you that "the tissue" was your face...

[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] buckled the last strap, securing you on the operating table. "I will not lie to you, my [Root.GetLordLady]. This will be excruciatingly painful, but it must be done." You tried to protest when [court_physician.GetFirstName] brought out the saw, but due to the calming potion [court_physician.GetSheHe] had made you drink, you slurred the words beyond comprehension.

[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] buckled the last strap, securing you on the operating table. "I will not lie to you, my [Root.GetLordLady]. This will be excruciatingly painful, but it must be done." You tried to protest when [court_physician.GetFirstName] brought out the saw, but due to the calming potion [court_physician.GetSheHe] had made you drink, you slurred the words beyond comprehension.
[court_physician.GetBestName] gave me a mix of herbal tea to drink daily and I was told to relax and avoid food.

[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] insisted that your humors were out of balance and that the best way to restore them would be through bloodletting. After consulting the astronomical charts, [court_physician.GetSheHe] decided that you should be bled from your armpits and temples.

[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] told you to undress and then kneel with your buttocks raised. That was awkward enough, but when you saw the instrument in [court_physician.GetHerHis] hands you almost bolted. [court_physician.GetFirstName] must have noticed, because [court_physician.GetSheHe] patted you calmingly on the shoulder and told you to stop clenching.

[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] entered your chambers with an earthenware jar cradled in [court_physician.GetHerHis] arms and came to sit by your bed. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] pulled a leech from the jar and gave it a most tender look before carefully placing it on your face. "Remain still, my [Root.GetLordLady]. Better not disturb their feeding."

When [court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] entered your chambers [court_physician.GetSheHe] was followed by an air most foul. The stench seemed to originate from the jar in [court_physician.GetHerHis] hands– "a mixture of cow's dung and herbs for your poultice, [Root.GetMasterMistress]". When [court_physician.GetFirstName] proceeded to smear it on your chest you almost retched.

[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] presented you with the charred carcass of a cat and prompted you to dig in. As you ate, [court_physician.GetSheHe] told you how [court_physician.GetSheHe] had chased the plump feline around your holdings for hours. You felt as if [court_physician.GetSheHe] wanted praise for [court_physician.GetHerHis] hard work, but the vile taste of the meal kept you silent.

[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] brought a croaking bucket to your chambers and told you to expose your upper body. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] grabbed a toad, gutted it with a deft hand and proceeded to place the still twitching carcass on your chest. [court_physician.GetFirstName] continued until the bucket was empty and your torso was covered.

[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] came to your chambers and offered you a draught which was yellow in color. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] told you to pinch your nose as you drank it. When the tepid liquid passed your lips you almost immediately spat it out again. You demanded to know the content and [court_physician.GetSheHe] revealed that it was fresh urine from a pregnant sow.

[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] lowered [court_physician.GetHerHis] hand into the bucket [court_physician.GetSheHe] brought to to your chambers. When [court_physician.GetSheHe] pulled it out again a little fish was wriggling between [court_physician.GetHerHis] fingers. "Open wide" [court_physician.GetSheHe] prompted you and dropped it in your mouth. You struggled not to retch as it tickled the back of your throat.

The red powder was tantalizing in color. A servant had made the mistake of tasting it in its pure form - his tongue had swollen up badly and [court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] had chastized him firmly for it. [court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] poured the spice into a chalice of water and stirred it meticulously, before feeding you a spoonful.

Your eyes widened when [court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] led a goat into your chambers. The foul smell of its flatulence made you both cover your noses, but the physician pulled your hand away. "Apologies, my [Root.GetLordLady], this is the treatment." [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] recommended deep breaths.

[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] brought you a concoction made from buckthorn and senna. At first you thought the potion ineffectual, but later the same day you felt a churning in your bowels which sent you running for the privy. As you howled in anguish, [court_physician.GetFirstName] assured you that the foulness was expelled with your feces.
[court_physician.GetBestName] sang for me a bit while [court_physician.GetSheHe] tucked me in. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] said that rest is enough to cure any ailment.

[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] was convinced that the best course of treatment would be some rest. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] surrounded you in soft pillows and gently tucked you in under many layers of blankets. Before [court_physician.GetFirstName] left your chambers, [court_physician.GetSheHe] pulled your curtains shut. It was noon.

[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] contributed your ailments to an unsound diet. To revitalize your body [court_physician.GetSheHe] insisted you consume only raw vegetables and herbal teas for a fortnight. So as not to tempt you, [court_physician.GetSheHe] confiscated your stash of treats. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] never returned them.

[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] told you to lie down on your bed and then to offer [court_physician.GetHerHim] your hands. Firmly [court_physician.GetSheHe] rubbed and slapped your palms until they were red, and then repeated the treatment on your soles. As a finishing touch [court_physician.GetSheHe] pinched you gently up and down your limbs.

[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] offered you a clear potion in a gilded vial. As you had tasted some previous remedied of [court_physician.GetFirstName]'s you were worried at first, but as you drank it you could detect neither odor nor taste. You inquired about the ingredients, but [court_physician.GetSheHe] told you that it was a secret recipe.

Relax your breathing, [court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] instructed you. The feather in [court_physician.GetHerHis] hand looked almost ethereal as [court_physician.GetSheHe] began to gently brush you under your nose. "Evil, begone!" [court_physician.GetSheHe] urged, as the sneezing began.

[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] arranged a small ceremony in your name. Once your family and closest entourage were all gathered in the main hall, the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] gave a sermon highlighting your virtue and benevolence. Their united prayers will surely speed your recovery.

You spent many evenings with [court_physician.GetTitledFirstName], as [court_physician.GetSheHe] recited you stories from [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName], until you were fast asleep. The routine has been comforting.

[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] called on the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] to bring forth the finest singer in the court, which turned out to be a young child with a bright tenor voice. For several days in a row, the child sang you to sleep. How soothing.

The water was steaming hot when [court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] let the honey drip into it. It dissolved almost instantly, but [court_physician.GetSheHe] stirred it for a long time. "That's it?", you finally asked. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] nodded, and you drank the tea.

The steam rose from the cup as [court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] stirred the green powder in it. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] explained the healing properties of the herb at length, before motioning for you to drink it. "The root is in there, too", [court_physician.GetSheHe] boastfully revealed.
[court_physician.GetTitledName] thinks your symptoms may point to Cancer. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.

[court_physician.GetTitledName] states that [court_physician.GetHerHis] extensive medical experience leads [court_physician.GetHerHim] to the certain conclusion that your symptoms point to Cancer. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.

[court_physician.GetTitledName] thinks your symptoms may point to Canter. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] expresses confusion as to why this would be a problem, but insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions anyway.
[court_physician.GetTitledName] thinks your symptoms point to Cancer. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.
[court_physician.GetTitledName] hesitantly suggests that your symptoms may point to Cancer. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.
[court_physician.GetTitledName]s' best guess is that you are in the early stages of Dysentery. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.

[court_physician.GetTitledName] states that [court_physician.GetHerHis] extensive medical experience leads [court_physician.GetHerHim] to the certain conclusion that you are in the early stages of Dysentery. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.

[court_physician.GetTitledName]s' best guess is that you are in the early stages of Dysentery. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] is sorry you have the trots but insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.
[court_physician.GetTitledName]s' educated guess is that you are in the early stages of Dysentery. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.
[court_physician.GetTitledName] reckons that you are in the early stages of Dysentery. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.
[court_physician.GetTitledName] is fairly sure you have the Flu. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.

[court_physician.GetTitledName] states that [court_physician.GetHerHis] extensive medical experience leads [court_physician.GetHerHim] to the certain conclusion that you have the Flu. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.
[court_physician.GetTitledName] thinks that you have the Flu. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] nags you to keep warm and insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.
[court_physician.GetTitledName] is sure you have the Flu. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.
[court_physician.GetTitledName] hesitantly suggests that you probably have the Flu. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.
[court_physician.GetTitledName] suggests you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions to combat the Food Poisoning you could well be suffering from.

[court_physician.GetTitledName] states that [court_physician.GetHerHis] extensive medical experience leads [court_physician.GetHerHim] to the certain conclusion that you have Food Poisoning. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.
[court_physician.GetTitledName] suggests that you are saddled with Food Poisoning. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.
[court_physician.GetTitledName] suggests you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions to combat the Food Poisoning you most likely suffer from.
[court_physician.GetTitledName] hesitantly suggests that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions to combat the Food Poisoning you might suffer from.
[court_physician.GetTitledName] guess is that you are in the early stages of Gout. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.

[court_physician.GetTitledName] states that [court_physician.GetHerHis] extensive medical experience leads [court_physician.GetHerHim] to the certain conclusion that you are in the early stages of Gout. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.

[court_physician.GetTitledName] enters the room with a long face. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] fears you are in the early stages of Gout, a condition that can cause lameness. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] promises to make it quick when the time comes, before insisting that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.
[court_physician.GetTitledName] educated guess is that you are in the early stages of Gout. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.
[court_physician.GetTitledName] reckons that you are in the early stages of Gout. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.
[court_physician.GetTitledName] is worried that you may have Syphilis. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.

[court_physician.GetTitledName] states that [court_physician.GetHerHis] extensive medical experience leads [court_physician.GetHerHim] to the certain conclusion that you have Syphilis. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.

[court_physician.GetTitledName] is concerned that you may have Syphilis. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] thinks that you mustang out with the wrong type of people. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.
[court_physician.GetTitledName] is worried that you have Syphilis. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.
[court_physician.GetTitledName] reckons that you have Syphilis. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.
[court_physician.GetTitledName] is worried you may be infected with the Bubonic Plague. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.

[court_physician.GetTitledName] states that [court_physician.GetHerHis] extensive medical experience leads [court_physician.GetHerHim] to the certain conclusion that you are infected with the Bubonic Plague. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.

[court_physician.GetTitledName] is worried you may be infected with the Bubonic Plague and you mare may not recover. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.
[court_physician.GetTitledName] is worried you are infected with the Bubonic Plague. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.
[court_physician.GetTitledName] hesitantly suggests you are probably infected with the Bubonic Plague. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.
[court_physician.GetTitledName] is fairly sure you have Measles. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.

[court_physician.GetTitledName] states that [court_physician.GetHerHis] extensive medical experience leads [court_physician.GetHerHim] to the certain conclusion that you have Measles. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.

[court_physician.GetTitledName] is fairly sure you have Measles, but [court_physician.GetSheHe] hopes that it will not be there furlong. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.
[court_physician.GetTitledName] is sure you have Measles. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.

[court_physician.GetTitledName] hesitantly suggests you are probably have Measles. Or Weasels? No, definitely Measles. Probably. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.
[court_physician.GetTitledName] is worried that you may be developing Smallpox. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.

[court_physician.GetTitledName] states that [court_physician.GetHerHis] extensive medical experience leads [court_physician.GetHerHim] to the certain conclusion that you are developing Smallpox. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.

[court_physician.GetTitledName] is worried that your rein may be at an end, as you seem to be developing Smallpox. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.
[court_physician.GetTitledName] is worried that you are developing Smallpox. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.

[court_physician.GetTitledName] reckons that you are may be developing Smallpox, which is probably not too bad since it is small. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.
[court_physician.GetTitledName] is fairly sure you are developing Consumption. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.

[court_physician.GetTitledName] states that [court_physician.GetHerHis] extensive medical experience leads [court_physician.GetHerHim] to the certain conclusion that you are developing Consumption. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.

[court_physician.GetTitledName] thinks you sound rather horse and is concerned that you may be developing Consumption. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.
[court_physician.GetTitledName] is sure you are developing Consumption. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.

[court_physician.GetTitledName] hesitantly suggests you are probably developing Consumption, or something like that. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.
[court_physician.GetTitledName] is fairly sure you are developing Slow Fever. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.

[court_physician.GetTitledName] states that [court_physician.GetHerHis] extensive medical experience leads [court_physician.GetHerHim] to the certain conclusion that you are developing Slow Fever. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.

[court_physician.GetTitledName] is fairly sure you are developing Slow Fever, although so far your condition is stable. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.
[court_physician.GetTitledName] is sure you are developing Slow Fever. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.

[court_physician.GetTitledName] hesitantly suggests you are probably developing Slow Fever, or something like that. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.
[court_physician.GetTitledName] is fairly sure you are developing Camp Fever. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.

[court_physician.GetTitledName] states that [court_physician.GetHerHis] extensive medical experience leads [court_physician.GetHerHim] to the certain conclusion that you are developing Camp Fever. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.

[court_physician.GetTitledName] is fairly sure you are developing Camp Fever, a disease which can cause an altered mental state. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] pauses briefly to shake [court_physician.GetHerHis] mane and stamp a hoof several times on the floor before warning you to be on the lookout for signs of delirium. [court_physician.GetTitledName] insists that you whinnied to follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.
[court_physician.GetTitledName] is sure you are developing Camp Fever. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.

[court_physician.GetTitledName] hesitantly suggests you are probably developing Camp Fever, or something like that. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.
[court_physician.GetTitledName] suggests your symptom is not due to a serious illness and that it will pass quite soon. Nevertheless, you will receive some mild treatment.

[court_physician.GetTitledName] states that [court_physician.GetHerHis] extensive medical experience leads [court_physician.GetHerHim] to the certain conclusion that your symptom is not due to a serious illness and that it will pass quite soon. Nevertheless, you will receive some mild treatment.
[court_physician.GetTitledName] suggests your symptom is not due to a serious illness and that it will not be there furlong. Nevertheless, you will receive some mild treatment.
[court_physician.GetTitledName] is confident your symptom is not due to a serious illness and that it will pass quite soon. Nevertheless, you will receive some mild treatment.
[court_physician.GetTitledName] hesitantly suggests that your symptom is probably not due to a serious illness and that it will pass quite soon. Nevertheless, you will receive some mild treatment.
[court_physician.GetTitledName] thinks your symptoms may point to Pneumonia. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.

[court_physician.GetTitledName] states that [court_physician.GetHerHis] extensive medical experience leads [court_physician.GetHerHim] to the certain conclusion that your symptoms point to Pneumonia. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.

[court_physician.GetTitledName] thinks your symptoms may point to Pneumonia and fears your days of horsing around are at an end. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.
[court_physician.GetTitledName] thinks your symptoms point to Pneumonia. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.
[court_physician.GetTitledName] hesitantly suggests that your symptoms probably point to Pneumonia. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.
[court_physician.GetTitledName] thinks it's quite likely you have Rabies. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.

[court_physician.GetTitledName] states that [court_physician.GetHerHis] extensive medical experience leads [court_physician.GetHerHim] to the certain conclusion that you have Rabies. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.

[court_physician.GetTitledName] thinks your foaming at the mouth could either be due to running around too much, or Rabies. In either case, [court_physician.GetSheHe] recommends that you try to suppress any sudden bursts of excitement, and insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.
[court_physician.GetTitledName] thinks it's very likely you have Rabies. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.
[court_physician.GetTitledName] hesitantly suggests you are probably have Rabies. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.
[court_physician.GetTitledName] thinks you may be developing the Great Pox. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.

[court_physician.GetTitledName] states that [court_physician.GetHerHis] extensive medical experience leads [court_physician.GetHerHim] to the certain conclusion that you are developing the Great Pox. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.
[court_physician.GetTitledName] blames your own foalish choices for the fact you have the Great Pox. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.
[court_physician.GetTitledName] is sure you are developing the Great Pox. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.
[court_physician.GetTitledName] hesitantly suggests you are probably developing the Great Pox. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] insists that you follow [court_physician.GetHerHis] instructions.

To treat your abdominal pain [court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] had you carry around the bone of a chicken, tied into a small pouch, around your neck. "It wards off the bad spirits", [court_physician.GetSheHe] told you solemnly.
To remedy your abdominal pain [court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] rubbed a strangely scented oil on your stomach and told you to repeat the procedure every morning.
To relieve you of your abdominal pain [court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] rubbed your stomach for the better part of an hour.
[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] refurnished your room. "Your bed facing eastwards might ease your pain."
[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] locked you in your chambers, accompanied by a small lizard. When the lizard has died your chest pains should ease.
For your chest pains [court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] told you to sleep with your door open. "You have to let the spirits in", [court_physician.GetSheHe] said.
[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] gave you hot goat's milk with honey for your cough.
[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] instructed you to gargle a salty infusion of licorice root and thyme for your cough.
[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] told you lean over a pot of boiling water and breathe in the steam against your cough.
To reduce your cramps [court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] had you stand in a bucket of warm water until your toes had wrinkled.
[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] gave you a lump of shiny metal to put in your mouth for an hour each night to cure you of your cramps.
To lessen the severity of your cramps [court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] ordered you to rub your limbs with vinegar every morning and evening.
[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] instructed you to avoid spices and fatty foods to treat your diarrhea.
[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] gave you a pot of steaming chamomile tea to treat your diarrhea.
[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] told you to eat ten apples a day to treat your diarrhea.
[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] told you to eat plenty of spicy food to remedy your fatigue.
[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] rubbed peppermint leaves on your hands and feet to remedy your fatigue.
To remedy your fatigue, [court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] gave you a draught of milk and poppy to help you sleep.
[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] gave you a footbath against your fever. It was freezing.
The liquid in the chalice was warm and sour. "It will chase the other heat away", [court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] explained.
To combat your fever [court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] wrapped you in wet pieces of linen cloth, hoping it would relieve the worst of the heat.
[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] insisted that you would feel much better if your humors were restored to their proper balance and that bloodletting was the best way to go about it.
To balance your humors, [court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] made you sprint around your keep to induce sweating.
In order to bring balance to your humors, [court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] made you drink salty water to induce vomiting. It was very effective.
[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] insisted that you should abstain from food in order to feel better and prescribed a three day fast.
To draw the illness out of your body, [court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] covered you from head to toe in leeches.
To relieve you of your worst ailments, [court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] suggested you should spend more time in prayer.
To invigorate you [court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] recommended that you consume what made you strong in the first place, and thus provided you with jugs of human breast milk.
[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] insisted that the foul smells of civilization made you sick and ordered you to take daily walks in the wilderness.

[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] was certain that your illness was caused by too much laughter. To make you better, [court_physician.GetSheHe] forbade everyone to tell you jokes and provided you with tedious tomes.

To rid you of your ailments [court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] ordered you to sleep hanging upside down for a couple of days. "It will rebalance you", [court_physician.GetSheHe] assured you. \n\nYou feel like a bat.
To ease your troubles [court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] consulted the stars before draining a good portion of your blood.

To ease your pain [court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] had you write down the names of your worst enemies and, when nobody was looking, toss the parchment into a fire. "Better them than you, my [Root.GetLordLady]."

To alleviate your pain [court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] lit three candles and had you join hands with [court_physician.GetHerHim]. After a moment of silence [court_physician.GetSheHe] had you repeat some words after [court_physician.GetHerHim] in a language you did not understand...
[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] spent many hours studying the stars before informing you that in order for your strength to return, you had to fast for the better half of a fortnight.
[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] strapped you to a chair and had you sleep sitting upright for days.
[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] kept you up late for days, stargazing with [court_physician.GetHerHim]. "To reconnect with the moon", [court_physician.GetSheHe] said.
For your headache [court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] handed you a cup of what looked like hot water with red flakes in it and told you to drink it slowly.
To relieve your headache [court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] ordered you to lay down and rest for the afternoon.
[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] filled your pillows with dried branches of lavender and peppermint, hoping it would relieve your headache. It smelled lovely.
[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] affixed a small bag filled with oats to your face and advised you to eat them all.
[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] rubbed a liniment all over your body. After an initially painful warmth, it felt quite soothing.
[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] turned [court_physician.GetHerHis] back and suddenly kicked you full in the chest.
[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] took you out to a meadow and had you roll on your back in the grass.
[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] spent several hours brushing your hair, it was very relaxing.
To reduce your malaise [court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] told you to stop worrying and to start delegating your tasks.

[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] told you [court_physician.GetSheHe] had had [court_physician.GetHerHis] assistant plant some onions. The first to bloom would tell us whether to stop the ointment or not. Until then you rub the sticky stuff onto your chest.
To treat your malaise [court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] ordered you to eat plenty of fatty and well-spiced food.
[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] clad your bed in wet grass and told you to sleep on this nature's embrace against your rash.
[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] gave you a stern look. "Remember to use this poultice on your rash every midnight. [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] alone won't aid you."
[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] gave you a jar containing a mixture made from goat's milk and the fat of a boar to smear on your rashes.
To stop you from vomiting [court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] told you to sleep with an acorn under your pillow.
To remedy your vomiting [court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] rubbed a lovely scented oil on every servant of your court. "It's not your fault they are filthy, my [Root.GetLordLady]".
To keep you from vomiting [court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] had you drink a tall glass of a rare onion water following each of your meals.

[court_physician.GetFirstName] sat you in front of a tall mirror and lit a circle of candles around you. "We need to contact the other you", [court_physician.GetSheHe] stated casually. When you raised your eyebrows at [court_physician.GetHerHim] [court_physician.GetSheHe] placed a hand on your shoulder. "This will... alter you."

Confined to your bed, the servants told you that the smoke from the pyre could be seen for miles. The lives of over two dozen fine animals had been ended in the night, in a grand sacrifice. As per [court_physician.GetTitledFirstName]'s orders, you have been rubbing your skin with the ashes for a fortnight.

The room was lit up only by the flame of a candle. Facing the westward window, [court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] painted your nails with drops of oil. You felt a heat on your skin as [court_physician.GetSheHe] moved your hand towards the flame. "Do not fret, my [Root.GetLordLady]. By the wisdom of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName], you shall be cleansed."

The moon demands your devotion [court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] said, before handing you a pipe of something with a spicy scent. After a few tokes you looked up at the night sky and improvised the greatest poem in the world. Later, the words elude you...

[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] instructed you to step into the empty tub and left you to undress in private. [court_physician.GetFirstName]'s return was heralded by a loud "baah!". [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] was followed by a servant and half a dozen goats. With a deft hand, [court_physician.GetFirstName] proceeded to grab the goats and slit their throats over the tub, one by one. The stains on the floor will not go away.

[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] had you drink an especially heavy brew, every night before bedtime. "It loosens the fabric of your being, letting the spirits into your body", [court_physician.GetSheHe] assured you. "It's also quite... relaxing", [court_physician.GetSheHe] admitted, grinning at you.

[court_physician.GetFirstName] told you that the task of interpreting [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] is difficult work, but cleansing through fire is an art as old as the world itself. Little did you know [court_physician.GetSheHe] would have you walk over burning coals.

[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] told you that [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] demands a trial of your mind. Together you traveled until you reached a small lake. Hand in hand, you walked into the water. You were shocked when [court_physician.GetFirstName] grabbed you by the shoulder and held you down.

[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] told you that [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] demands a sacrifice. Later that evening you heard screaming. Following the sound you found [court_physician.GetFirstName] hunched over a body, panic in [court_physician.GetHerHis] eyes, blood on [court_physician.GetHerHis] hands. "It was for the good of the realm...!", [court_physician.GetSheHe] breathed.

[court_physician.GetFirstName] gave you a pouch of herbs and sent you on a journey, to find your spirit guide. You wandered the wilderness for days, eating only roots from the pouch, sleeping under the stars. Finally, you felt a presence and you saw a great horned beast. Afterwards you wondered... Are you the beast?

[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] stood at the end of your bed as the servants lit the candles. A pot was placed in your hands - judging from the sounds, it contained a terrified rat. "The creature will carry your burdens in your stead", [court_physician.GetSheHe] explained. Then the chanting began.

One early day [court_physician.GetFirstName] invited you to join [court_physician.GetHerHim] in [court_physician.GetHerHis] chambers. As the first bright rays of the morning sun shone into the room [court_physician.GetFirstName] went on and on about how serving you has been an honor. "For you, [Root.GetMasterMistress]" [court_physician.GetSheHe] breathed, before slitting [court_physician.GetHerHis] own throat with an ornamental knife.

Court Physician [court_physician.GetTitledName] has completely botched the treatment of my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName]'s disease! [From.GetFirstName] is now even worse off than before, barely clinging on to life! I am expected to punish [court_physician.GetTitledName] for this transgression, but what would be a suitable punishment?

After being skillfully treated by Court Physician [court_physician.GetTitledName], my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is feeling much better. Perhaps [court_physician.GetSheHe] is deserving of some praise?
After what seems like forever, the wound from your maiming has completely healed.

My court physician [court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] is worried about my newborn [sickly_infant.GetSonDaughter]. [sickly_infant.GetFirstName] is a feeble little thing, even compared to other infants. [court_physician.GetFirstName] says [sickly_infant.GetSheHe] might not live to see [sickly_infant.GetHerHis] first birthday.

It seems as if whatever treatment [court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] administered worked! Little [sickly_infant.GetFirstName] is much better. Now [sickly_infant.GetSheHe] appears to be no different than other children [sickly_infant.GetHerHis] age.

While little [sickly_infant.GetFirstName] still appears slightly weaker than other children [sickly_infant.GetHerHis] age, I swear [sickly_infant.GetSheHe] is much more energetic than [sickly_infant.GetSheHe] was a couple of weeks ago. [sickly_infant.GetSheHeCap] might not be out of the woods quite yet, but the worst has passed.

Whatever [court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] did, I cannot see any improvements in little [sickly_infant.GetFirstName]. My [sickly_infant.GetSonDaughter] still seems worryingly lethargic. [sickly_infant.GetHerHisCap] subdued cries send chills down my spine...
My [sickly_infant.GetSonDaughter] [sickly_infant.GetFirstName] was not meant for this world. Today [sickly_infant.GetSheHe] quietly drew [sickly_infant.GetHerHis] last breath.
Finally
I feel better.
My life is in your hands.

I feel amazing!
I actually feel better.

Very well.
§Y[court_physician.GetBestName]§! will do [court_physician.GetHerHis] best to treat your symptoms.
I am glad I hired [court_physician.GetFirstName].
I feel... different.
Off with [court_physician.GetHerHis] head!
I should compensate [court_physician.GetFirstName] for a job well done!
[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName], you must attempt to save my [sickly_infant.GetFirstName]!
§Y[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName]§! does [court_physician.GetHerHis] best to treat your [sickly_infant.GetSonDaughter] §Y[sickly_infant.GetTitledFirstName]§!.
[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] be praised for our good fortune!
Thank you, [court_physician.GetFirstName], for giving my [sickly_infant.GetSonDaughter] a second chance.
Why am I even paying that quack?!
§Y[court_physician.GetTitledFirstName]'s§! treatment of your [sickly_infant.GetSonDaughter] §Y[sickly_infant.GetTitledFirstName]§! was unsuccessful.
[court_physician.GetFirstName] is with [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] now.
That's not good.
As long as you know what you're doing.

§Y[court_physician.GetBestName]§! will perform some well tested treatment. There is a chance that the treatment has negative effects. The risk of this treatment will vary depending on [court_physician.GetHerHis] capabilities.
I should never have trusted [court_physician.GetFirstName].
I probably shouldn't have agreed to this...
Maybe I should have insisted on some other treatment...
I am not sure that did anything.
WHAT was that? I could've died, [court_physician.GetFirstName]!
I will talk some sense into [court_physician.GetHerHim].
No, [court_physician.GetSheHe] is merely doing [court_physician.GetHerHis] job.
So be it. Only the strong survive.
§Y[sickly_infant.GetTitledFirstName]§! will not be given any treatment for [sickly_infant.GetHerHis] ailments.
Please do only what is necessary.

§Y[court_physician.GetBestName]§! will make you more comfortable in your current state. This treatment will have a very small chance of going badly, but the positive effects will not have much impact. The risk of this treatment will vary depending on [court_physician.GetHerHis] capabilities.
The treatment was successful, but I paid a heavy price...
My child! NOOOO!
Easy now, [court_physician.GetFirstName] is trying [court_physician.GetHerHis] best.
I shall personally praise [court_physician.GetHerHim] to the court!
These treatments sound scary.
You prefer to be left to your own devices.\n
Curses! May [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] strike [court_physician.GetTitledFirstName] down!
[court_physician.GetFirstName]! What did you do?!
Into the dungeon with [court_physician.GetHerHim]!
I trust your knowledge, oh wise one.

§Y[court_physician.GetBestName]§! will perform a mystical treatment. The outcome of this treatment is uncertain. The risk of this treatment will vary depending on [court_physician.GetHerHis] capabilities.
AAARGH!
Come on, [court_physician.GetFirstName], let's try something new. I insist.

§Y[court_physician.GetBestName]§! will perform an experimental treatment. The outcome of this treatment can be extreme. The risk of this treatment will vary depending on [court_physician.GetHerHis] capabilities.
[court_physician.GetTitledName] has informed me that my recent ailment is in fact Leprosy. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] was very sorry, but there is nothing [court_physician.GetSheHe] can do.
Your Court Physician, [court_physician.GetFullName], has gained widespread reputation after having worked in your court. [court_physician.GetSheHeCap] is now considered a Renowned Physician.
This treatment will probably affect your mental state...\n\n
You will be cured of your disease! \n\n
